name: Red Square (itch) (Mondlichtgames)
description:
The circle people have enslaved the square people for hundreds of years. They believe the circle to be the superior shape. The red square is fighting for the liberation of the square people. He has infiltrated a secret military base of the circle people and is going to explore it.

Made for Christmas Jam 2019 with the Love2d Framework 11.2.

Controls:

Press Z to jump (hold to jump higher)

Press X to shoot

Gamepad support: Use Button 1 to jump, right shoulder button to fire, dpad to move.

Experimental full-screen support with f11. (but windowed mode is recommend)
